title: Magic Missile
summaries: The Magic Missile is a pre-Hardmode magic weapon that fires an exploding projectile that can be controlled by holding the ⚒ Use / Attack button and moving the cursor. If the ⚒ Use / Attack button is released mid-drag, the missile will be flung in that direction. If the cursor is stationary on release, it flies directly away from the player. The projectile also emits a moderate amount of light. The Magic Missile has a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being obtained from the Locked Gold Chests found in the Dungeon, as well as a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being obtained from Golden Lock Boxes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) If any enemies are nearby when the missile is released, the missile will home in and attack them.
